error:
I don't see the JSON content. Please paste the actual en-US.json file content (the JSON) you want translated. 

Notes: I will
- translate all string values into Italian,
- keep any placeholders like {name} or {count} exactly as-is,
- preserve the original JSON structure and keys,
- return the JSON with unescaped Unicode (actual Italian characters).

If you also want the locale field changed (e.g. "locale": "it"), tell me and I'll update it.
